name: Snake: Road to apple
description: Snake: Road to Apple snake is a nice classic game. Eating apples, earn points. Earn a maximum of points!
minimum_requirements: OS: Window 7 and higher Processor: 2.4 GHz Intel® Core™2 Duo or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher with 1GB Memory DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 20 MB available space
